o cara joga de bruxa nem Ã© gente

If you like the "horror" element or have friends to survive with then play as survivor where you try to complete an objective before dying by the killer which if playing alone you might never know who it is for some time, if playing with friends then communication is key to survival. If you hate people or have no friends to play with then you can play as killer where you try to dominate four survivors that are trying to escape death. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes horror at first but once you start putting time into this game it turns into another skill based team game. There are some bugs with almost every new update but the major/minor ones get fixed fairly quickly (within two weeks or so). Hitboxes can be annoying and your personal connection to the internet can change the difficulty of surviving drastically. A good connection, a good computer, and some friends make this game definitely worth the buy. Sometimes this game causes rage or physical/emotional pain.

I feel happy to spend time for this game.

Good things about this game:-Developers actually try their best to make it a good game-when the game is fun it's really fun; kind of addicting in this way-Game is fairly well balanced (contrary to what many people will tell you)-Lots of fun to play with friends and as killer-Not pay-to-win, very skill based. I would compare this game almost to chess in how memorizing tiles and understanding strategy works.Bad things about this game:-Developers screw things up sometimes, normally this isn't too bad though-Games updates are a mess. An update that takes 5 minutes to install will spend another 15 rearranging files.-Not always fun to play solo as survivor, you can get stuck with teammates who troll or just suck in general-It takes a lot of time to learn after mastering the basics.

Super fun game. I love slashers and this game is amazing. I like it better than various other asymmetric games. The rush of adrenaline while playing the survivors is crazy good and it's a blast to hunt people as the killer >:)

Very fun game, tactical, stealth, surprise element!Lots of factor involved, learn how to be a good survivor or killer...Survivor is in 3rd person view while playing as a killer make you to see in first person, killer move faster, survivor move slower but faster on faulting therefore there is a loop you can do as a survivor to get more time for your teammate to do generators...They just improved the graphic too on this game which look much more awesome!
